pageContext.claim: “‘Sources say,’ ‘five sources within the White House say,’ and there are no sources. They make it up. They're like novelists. There are no sources.”
pageContext.analysis: Reputable news organizations do not make up sources; it is a fireable offense. Trump White House staff frequently speak to reporters on the condition of anonymity. Trump has a long history of being an anonymous source for reporters. He regularly tweets out articles that are based on anonymous sources.
